CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Control levels of fog emerging from the z axis
CONTROLS.NAME: Fog

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Move around the camera. Can be reset with Cam_Reset
CONTROLS.NAME: LookXY

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Transition from a straight path to a curved one that alternates sides
CONTROLS.NAME: Curve_Path

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add some waviness to the y coordinates!
CONTROLS.NAME: Wave_Height

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fast the time variable grows, whether it is reactive time or constant time.
CONTROLS.NAME: rate_in

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: reactive_time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_lights

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Get rid of those bolts on the wall, ya goof!
CONTROLS.NAME: Remove_Bolts

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Cycles through some bump mapping driven by audio levels. It looks... eh, it's not perfect
CONTROLS.NAME: Surface_Time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Transition between a color and the original texture
CONTROLS.NAME: Texture

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Goopify the scene! Turns down the number of iterations of the raymarching function.
CONTROLS.NAME: Ray_Steps

DESCRIPTION: Using cylindrical coordinates to construct a steel-plated tunnel with an industrial feel.
TITLE: Industrial Tunnel
